name: Endless Journey
description:
Endless Journey is an immersive  world exploration game , where every aspect of the players experience is  procedurally  generated  to create an ever changing environment. 

With no real objective the goal is to relax and enjoy the view.

New Version!

* Now includes daytime sunlight effects (Sunrises and sunsets, with stars appearing at night). Different sky color is less noticeable.

* Massive Performance improvements

Developers: Sagie Levy & Tom Feigin

Music            : Ori Angel

3D Models  : Oded Kofian
